nodes.bodyText: I noticed there seems to be some additional issue here. So from the HQL it seems the result should be a list of Set<Group>, but the real result is a list of Group. Is that a bug?

You are mixing things up. When encountering a path expression that ends on a non-basic typed attribute, it is implicit joined. So the query would be equivalent to the following SELECT g FROM User u JOIN u.groups g WHERE u.id = ?1
thanks for clarification. my knowledge gap here.
